attributes.action: Support all British Citizens in voting for the Green Party in the upcoming European Elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The next European Parliamentary elections are expected to be held on 4 June 2009.  We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to support all British Citizens in voting for the Green Party in the upcoming European Elections as a protest vote against all mainstream UK political parties for taking advantage of the British Public.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot host party political material, such as references to political parties. More guidance can be found here: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
